hasDitaContent.@value: Both diamorphine and perampanel can have CNS depressant effects, which might affect the ability to perform skilled tasks (see 'Drugs and Driving' in Guidance on Prescribing).

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  diamorphine  and  perampanel  can have CNS depressant effects, which might affect the ability to perform skilled tasks (see 'Drugs and Driving' in  Guidance on Prescribing ).
